name: ClassPass
0:
”Alexa, ask Class Pass to search for a pilates class near me”
”Alexa, ask Class Pass to search for a free upper body workout”
”Alexa, ask Class Pass to go to membership page”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: class pass
des: The ClassPass Skill is an awesome companion to ClassPass and classpass.com that helps you get more done, faster, using Alexa on your phone. Try it with a pair of Echo Buds, Echo Frames, or an Alexa hands-free phone! Note: This skill is meant to be used on your phone. With this skill, Alexa can help you: Search for a pilates class near you, Search for a free upper body workout, Go to membership page, To open membership page, Update my billing, To show my upcoming classes/appointments, When is my next class. You can ask, “Alexa, ask Class Pass what can I say”
